example_sentence.English: Today begins a new year!

Jaobon.roman: je son kai nu nen!
Jaobon.CJK: 这日开新年！

example_sentence.English: The sunlight melts the snow.

Jaobon.roman: son lus as ke ten bin wa ben lu.
Jaobon.CJK: 日光使何天冰水变流。

example_sentence.English: On the internet, many people like looking at pictures of cats.

Jaobon.roman: en lek nao ne den, men jen xi kan pik nis gak.
Jaobon.CJK: 在电脑网内，们人喜看像于猫。

example_sentence.English: During the daytime, stars cannot be seen.

Jaobon.roman: lus xas xin no ken es kan.
Jaobon.CJK: 光时星不能是看。

example_sentence.English: All people live together in just one world.

Jaobon.roman: me jen jo bi en un cok man guk we.
Jaobon.CJK: 每人就活在一球满组为。

example_sentence.English: Bicycles have two wheels.

Jaobon.roman: jao pao ce yo dos lun.
Jaobon.CJK: 脚力车有二轮。

example_sentence.English: Triangles are the strongest shape.

Jaobon.roman: san huk jan es la jan ki mas duk.
Jaobon.CJK: 三角张是边张者更刚。

example_sentence.English: Spring is one quarter of the year.

Jaobon.roman: cun xas es un de cak pis de nen.
Jaobon.CJK: 春时是一从四块从年。

example_sentence.English: My hand has five fingers. The shortest is called the thumb.

Jaobon.roman: mi xo yo u xo cik. ki mas kok es min nis ho xo cik.
Jaobon.CJK: 我手有五手子。者更刻是名于厚手子。

example_sentence.English: A carbon atom has six protons.

Jaobon.roman: cun us gok yo ses sun gok.
Jaobon.CJK: 春质点有六酸点。

example_sentence.English: People say that seven is their favorite number more often than any other number.

Jaobon.roman: jen men des ke ci es ji ki se mas xi mas bes de me o ji.
Jaobon.CJK: 人们言何七是计者己更喜更次从每另计。

example_sentence.English: In modern computers, a byte has eight bits.

Jaobon.roman: en lek nao de je xas des guk yo ok yes o no.
Jaobon.CJK: 在电脑从这时言组有八唉另不。

example_sentence.English: The last digit of a price is very often nine.

Jaobon.roman: ji xe cik ki en bek de goi nes es nai hen men bes.
Jaobon.CJK: 计写子者在后从贵性是九很们次。

example_sentence.English: Should we use ten or twelve as a numerical base?

Jaobon.roman: mi men gai yus das o das dos nis ji gen?
Jaobon.CJK: 我们该用十另十二于计根？

example_sentence.English: My car has bad tires.

Jaobon.roman: mi ce yo gas lun ki ca.
Jaobon.CJK: 我车有气轮者差。

example_sentence.English: Wood is used to make paper.

Jaobon.roman: mu es yus we ki mak mu pen.
Jaobon.CJK: 木是用为者作木片。

example_sentence.English: An engine burns gasoline.

Jaobon.roman: ik hoi mek as ik xok yos.
Jaobon.CJK: 火回器使火石油。

example_sentence.English: I didn't have enough money to buy the hat.

Jaobon.roman: mi pas no yo jin ki go nis mai tek je to te.
Jaobon.CJK: 我过不有金者够于买拿这头布。

example_sentence.English: Do you want ice and lemon to put in your water?

Jaobon.roman: ni yao bin wa i sun gos pon a ni wa o?
Jaobon.CJK: 你要冰水又酸果加向你水另？

example_sentence.English: We can give you a map of the park.

Jaobon.roman: mi men ken ba tu pik de gon tu ge ni.
Jaobon.CJK: 我们能把土像从公土给你。

example_sentence.English: The soup with cauliflower is my favorite.

Jaobon.roman: je hun wa ki yo wai yun sai es mas xi nis mi.
Jaobon.CJK: 这混水者有白云菜是更喜于我。

example_sentence.English: Unripe fruit is usually green.

Jaobon.roman: sai gos ki no lis es gin mas bes.
Jaobon.CJK: 菜果者不备是绿更次。

example_sentence.English: In old times people made money from gold.

Jaobon.roman: gu xas jen men as yus kun jin mak mai jin.
Jaobon.CJK: 故时人们使用黄金作买金。

example_sentence.English: The surface of Mars is iron oxide, that's why it's red.

Jaobon.roman: pi de jin xin es jus jin sun hun, loi es hon.
Jaobon.CJK: 皮从金星是汁金酸混，而是红。

example_sentence.English: If the eyes of the mother and father are both blue, the eyes of their child must also be blue.

Jaobon.roman: juk yek de nus ma i nan ma es lan, yek de cik mos ye lan.
Jaobon.CJK: 如眼从女亲又男亲是蓝，眼从子必也蓝。

example_sentence.English: The inside of the cave is the darkest place I've ever been.

Jaobon.roman: xok bok den es mas dak de me o luk ki mi pas bis.
Jaobon.CJK: 石孔内是更黑从每另所者我过客。
